Package com.example.qr_go_gotta_scan_em_all

Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.qr_go_gotta_scan_em_all.Pokemon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Pokemon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a Pokemon object. Contains information about the Pokemon's image, location, and ID.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Simple Scoring function that calculates the score based on the number of characters. The score changes based on the hexadecimal representation of the SHA-256 encrypted string The score is calculated by finding consecutive repeating characters, converting the repeated char into a string and put it to the power of the number of the repeats of that char - 1
        Returns:
        the long of the score

      • setImage

        Parameters:
        image - The new image of the Pokemon.

      • setLocation

                        double lon)
        Sets the location of the Pokemon to a given value.
        Parameters:
        lat - double of latitude
        lon - double of longitude
